Content:: The 106th edition of the Tour of Flanders one-day cycling classic took place on 3 April 2022, as the 12th event of the 2022 UCI World Tour. The race began in Antwerp and covered 272.5 kilometres (169.3 mi) on the way to the finish in Oudenaarde.[1] Seventeen of the eighteen UCI WorldTeams and seven UCI ProTeams participated in the race, of which only Team DSM, with six riders, did not enter the maximum of seven riders. From the field of 167 riders, there were 103 finishers.[2] UCI WorldTeams UCI ProTeams
Title: 2022 Tour of Flanders - Wikipedia
